001package org.opencv.core;
002
003public class CvException extends RuntimeException {
004
005    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
006
007    public CvException(String msg) {
008        super(msg);
009    }
010
011    @Override
012    public String toString() {
013        return "CvException [" + super.toString() + "]";
014    }
015}
